channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter dropped on approach to roundabouts. Local drivers throwing rubbish from takeaways onto the verges as they slow down approaching roundabouts., 8th March
item.description:
Just by the side of the road - on the verge. Lots of litter. Needs cleaning up please. The local residents can't do it themselves because it is too dangerous for them. Please organise regular clean ups on the verges approaching the roundabouts around Gloucester. It is upsetting the local residents. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Interchange, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter dropped on the approach to the roundabout that needs to be picked up please, 8th March
item.description:
On approach to roundabout on left hand side - just as vehicles slow down. People throw rubbish out their windows when they are slowing down or stopping near the roundabout. I am happy to clean the rubbish myself but it is a bit too dangerous for me.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): C&G Roundabout, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oaklands, Gotherington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Exposed traffic signal detection cables, 7th March
item.description:
A417 northbound junction with elm bridge court lights controlled roundabout 'hamburger roundabout' pothole 50cm beyond stop line in lane 2 pothole exposing traffic signal detection loop cables. visible by users on the roundabout. seen by 94 bus driver Tuesday 5th
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littered with potholes, 7th March
item.description:
Located immediately outside Boston Tea Party at clearance street arrival bus stop. entire section of road filled with potholes of various sizes with main potholes along kerb edge. Busses are requiring to remain wide to avoid potholes when setting down passengers in the vicinity of the stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Clarence Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Park and ride sign off pole, 7th March
item.description:
On approach to the roundabout from golden valley bamferloung lane immediately after the short section of camera controlled bus lane. Park and Ride directional sign not secured to posts and on floor leaning against post. Needs to be raised and resecured
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing yellow flexible bollard/sign on Pittville Circus Road, 7th March
item.description:
The road crossing point with dropped path and kerb opposite rexcote still has a missing yellow flexible bollard, there is a triangular sign lying down for some reason which is a trip hazard. This issue has been ongoing months, concerned as it is close to local schools/nursery and people use it regularly..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pittville Circus Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Huge potholes X4, 7th March
item.description:
Heading along Badgeworth lane towards Shurdington Road, inside the 50 MPH. Where the road is always wet. Several holes repaired a few again, now more have appeared. Reported 1 month ago & still not even marked for repair.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox in hedgerow, 7th March
item.description:
There's a fox carcass in the hedgerow, on the opposite side of the road to nos. 100/102. (Fairly certain it wasn't there yesterday, so most likely it was killed last night.)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 102, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large rectangle cut out on junction, 7th March
item.description:
There is a large rectangle of tarmac cut out on the Hester’s Way Road side of the junction with Falkland Place.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 108, Hesters Way Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely loud manhole constant banging, 7th March
item.description:
If front of the barber there is a manhole that is loose and sunken and this is causing an extremely loud bang when cars/lorry’s go over it. I work outside opposite at least 200 yards away and I can hear it banging all day long And it has been for months. The sound upclose is deafening and way above 85db limit please can this issue be looked at. 62 Swindon road. Please see attached photo.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Swindon Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
